item.title: Al-Futtaim Automall at Dubai Festival City is offering a selection of used cars
item.description: Source: Al-Futtaim Group. Used cars on offer at the Al-Futtaim Automall at Dubai Festival City. A new destination for used car shoppers in the UAE is coming soon with the launch of the country’s largest site at Dubai Festival City (DFC). Al-Futtaim Automall, the leading pre-owned vehicle retailer in the UAE, will inaugurate a spacious 12,000 sq m facility in June 2017. Situated opposite IKEA and adjacent to ACE, this new location will feature an inventory of over 400 vehicles.
